# tf.keras.preprocessing.text.one_hot

``` python
one_hot(
    text,
    n,
    filters='!"#$%&()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\\]^_`{|}~\t\n',
    lower=True,
    split=' '
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/preprocessing/text.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/preprocessing/text.py).
